snippet: The system had generated intense opposition among foreign governments, which accused Europe of imposing its environmental standards on the rest of the world.
abstract: European Commission will seek to delay plan to charge foreign airlines for greenhouse gas emissions for one year; system had generated intense opposition among foreign governments, which accused Europe of imposing its environmental standards on the rest of the world.
lead_paragraph: The system had generated intense opposition among foreign governments, which accused Europe of imposing its environmental standards on the rest of the world.

headline.seo: E.U. Postpones Charges for Airline Emissions
headline.main: E.U. Postpones Charges for Airline Emissions
headline.print_headline:
Europe Delays Fees
Meant to Cut
Jets’ Gases
